segments.text: Here is the fish counter . Look at the lobsters and crabs . Shall we have some ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm allergic to these things , you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , I forgot . I don ’ t like seafood , neither .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s go over there and get some milk , a couple dozen eggs and some orange juice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's get frozen juice . It is really good . We ’ Ve got enough food . Let ’ s go over to the check-out stand .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . But just let me pick up a bottle of cooking wine and oil as we go by .
segments.speaker: S2
